name: MONITOR DETECTIVE
description:
This game, created in 5 days for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2, you will have to check footage from security cameras to discover who is the killer in a series of levels. But there's a twist: The footage is constantly rewinding (The theme of the jam) and the camera from the room where the crime took place is, unfortunately, not working, so you will have to switch cameras to discover the truth!

Hope you enjoy this game! If you like the game, don't forget to review it!

We recommend  playing in fullscreen so as to see the whole game.

Music: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iYOvAO1rAM0&t=647s

Button sprites: https://latenighcoffe.itch.io/buttons-blocks-for-ui-gameplay

Wood sprites: https://www.artstation.com/artwork/nBX59
